name: Christmas Santa Jump With Snow
description:
Christmas Santa Jump with Snow

Enjoy christmas days with the Christmas Santa Jump with Snow.

Santa Claus jumping on the Step, jumping forward constantly climbing.

=> Easy to play
=> Endless game

Santa game is for those who want to make theire Christmas festival exiting and fun

In this game your role is to climb santa as high as possible to earn high points

lets enjoy the Christmas festival with "Sanat Fun"
